Row.Text: Greetings wanderer. I am Micanopy, chief of the Seminole people. We will respect you as long as you respect our sovereignty.
I'd rather die in combat than sign a cowardly peace treaty.
Hello again friend. There's quite a tranquility here in the swamp. Can you sense it too?
Your dishonorable crimes cannot go unpunished. We shall send you back to whence you came.

You have no respect for the rights of other nations, and as such, we will have no respect for you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Survival is infinitely more difficult without help. If we combine our forces, we can brace any onslaught or live through any disaster. Do you agree?
I suspected such treachery from the likes of you. So be it, send your armies into our swamps and see them perish!
